comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Francis_Picabia. "Francis-Marie Martinez Picabia (January 22, 1879 - November 30, 1953) was a well-known painter and poet born of a French mother and a Spanish-Cuban father who was an attaché at the Cuban legation in Paris, France. ... From 1913 to 1915 Picabia traveled to New York City several times and took active part in the avant-garde movements, introducing modern art to America. "
